meanings.definition: relating to or derived from living matter
meanings.sent1: The farmer used organics methods to grow healthy crops.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the organics compounds found in the soil.
meanings.sent3: The organics ingredients in the soup made it taste fresh and natural.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was like a garden of colorful organics shapes.
meanings.sent5: The forest was teeming with organics life, from plants to animals.

meanings.definition: a substance that is or contains organic compounds
meanings.sent1: She bought organics from the store for her skincare products.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician analyzed the organics under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The chef added a dash of organics to enhance the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent4: The lake water was tested for any organics pollutants.
meanings.sent5: The compost pile was full of rich organics matter for the garden.

meanings.definition: a category of food produced without the use of synthetic fertilizers or pesticides
meanings.sent1: The grocery store offered a variety of organics for health-conscious shoppers.
meanings.sent2: She preferred buying organics to support sustainable farming practices.
meanings.sent3: The restaurant proudly served dishes made with organics ingredients.
meanings.sent4: The farmers' market had a special section dedicated to organics produce.
meanings.sent5: The demand for organics has been steadily increasing among consumers.
